Case 1:19-cr-00830-AT Document 24 Filed 01/30/20 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

-against-

TOVA NOEL and MICHAEL THOMAS,
Defendants.

ANALISA TORRES, District Judge:

For reasons stated on the record at the status conference held on January 30, 2020, Defendants' motions to adjourn the trial date, ECF Nos. 20 and 21, are GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. The trial in this matter scheduled for April 20, 2020, is hereby ADJOURNED to June 22, 2020. Trial shall commence at 9:00 a.m. on June 22, 2020.

The Clerk of Court is directed to terminate the motions at ECF Nos. 20 and 21.

SO ORDERED.

Dated: January 30, 2020
New York, New York

ANALISA TORRES
United States District Judge

USDC SDNY
DOCUMENT
ELECTRONICALLY FILED
DOC #: 
DATE FILED: 1/30/2020

19 Cr. 830 (AT)

ORDER

DOJ-OGR-00022002

text_blocks.content: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA, -against- TOVA NOEL and MICHAEL THOMAS, Defendants.

For reasons stated on the record at the status conference held on January 30, 2020, Defendants' motions to adjourn the trial date, ECF Nos. 20 and 21, are GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. The trial in this matter scheduled for April 20, 2020, is hereby ADJOURNED to June 22, 2020. Trial shall commence at 9:00 a.m. on June 22, 2020.
The Clerk of Court is directed to terminate the motions at ECF Nos. 20 and 21.
Dated: January 30, 2020 New York, New York
